    public abstract class Mob
extends Entity
    Mob.java the base for any mobile character.       • Mob

        public Mob(Level level,
   java.lang.String name,
   int x,
   int y,
   int speed)
        Creates a new Mob.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to add the mob to
        name - the name of the mob
        x - the x position on the level to add the mob to
        y - the y position on the level to add the mob to
        speed - the movement speed of the mob

      • isSolidTile

        protected boolean isSolidTile(int xa,
                  int ya,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        Used when checking for a collision with a blocked tile.
        Parameters:
        xa - x-position of character
        ya - y-position of character
        x - x-position of tile
        y - y-position of tile
        Returns:
        true if the mob has collided with a blocked tile
